title: What can I do if my phone runs slowly?
answer:
l   On the **Phone Manager** screen, touch **Scan**, and follow the onscreen instructions to optimize your phone.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204201952902001.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204201953274002.jpg)

l   On the **Phone Manager** screen, touch **Phone accelerator**, and follow the onscreen instructions to close applications not in use.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204201953542003.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204201953118004.jpg)

l   On the **Phone Manager** screen, touch **Phone accelerator** > **Storage cleaner** > **Smart scan**, and follow the onscreen instructions to perform a smart scan, and clear the application cache, system trash files, applications you no longer need and their installation packages, and large files, such as videos and compressed packages.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204201953542003.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204201954646005.jpg)

l   Restart your phone.

If the problem persists, back up important data and restore your phone to its factory settings. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204201954699006.png)

The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
